description: Microsoft is offering a limited-time discount on all Windows 365 plans for new customers, which also includes free ESUs. Read more...
title: Microsoft launches 20% discount on Windows 365 for first-time customers

description: Nvidia has announced the games it plans to bring to GeForce NOW subscribers during May, which include Doom: The Dark Ages, Monster Train 2, and much more. Read more...
title: GeForce NOW is gaining Doom: The Dark Ages, Revenge of the Savage Planet, and more in May

description: Amazon's AWS has reported higher revenue and operating income for Q1 2025 than Microsoft's entire Intelligent Cloud segment. Read more...
title: AWS now makes more money than Microsoft's Cloud and Server business combined

description: Newly-released Windows Server build shines some light on a new Settings page with advanced settings in Windows 11. Read more...
title: Windows 11 is getting a new Settings page with advanced options

description: Prices are going down, and availability improves, which is good news for those wanting an RTX 5070 graphics card in Europe (apparently, not many). Read more...
title: There is no shortage of RTX 5070 cards, including FE, in Europe and prices are going down

description: Epic Games has announced an alternative way for iOS app developers to process external payments with a zero percent revenue split, as the court rules Apple must allow external payments. Read more...
title: Epic Games announces new way for developers to bypass Apple Tax completely

description: Google has shipped an update for its Voice service that brings three-way merging of calls and an updated appearance for the call screen. Read more...
title: Google Voice gets a call interface makeover and three-way support

description: Microsoft made a big change regarding BitLocker encryption on Windows 11 24H2 and apparently it is leading to users losing data. Read more...
title: Windows 11 users reportedly losing data due to Microsoft's forced BitLocker encryption

description: Google's AI Mode, a dedicated space to ask detailed and nuanced questions on the internet, is now out of waitlist and available to try. Read more...
title: Google's answer to ChatGPT search is finally out of waitlist

description: BOOX has launched a new colorful 25-inch E-Ink monitor that promises to be easy on your eyes, but the price tag will make them wet big time. Read more...
title: BOOX's new 25" e-ink monitor is easy on your eyes, but they will get wet once you see price

description: Whether you need a unique logo, captivating art, engaging articles, or interactive chatbots, AI Magicx has you covered. Read more...
title: A lifetime subscription to AI MagicX (Rune Plan) drops to lowest price

description: Microsoft announced a big price increase for Xbox consoles and accessories, but you can still score some of them at old prices and even with discounts. Read more...
title: Save big on Xbox consoles and accessories while Microsoft increases prices

description: With this free resource you'll be equipped to solve your Excel queries and start using the next generation of Microsoft Office tools. Read more...
title: Download AI and Business Rule Engines for Excel Power Users (worth $159.99) for free

description: Tails 6.15 is out now with an updated Tor Browser and Linux kernel. It also removes support for some older wireless chips. Read more...
title: Tails 6.15 out now with Tor Browser 14.5.1, Linux 6.1.135, and removed drivers

description: Mozilla released a small bug-fixing update for Firefox 138 to address some issues, including Outlook bugs. Read more...
title: Firefox 138.0.1 is out with fixes for Outlook bugs and more

description: All Game Pass members can try out two more games this weekend for no extra cost, with Microsoft bringing in Forza Motorsport and The Escapists. Read more...
title: Forza Motorsport and The Escapists join Xbox Free Play Days for the weekend

description: Microsoft recently removed one of the most popular methods for bypassing Windows 11 requirements of internet connectivity and Microsoft Account. Users are quite annoyed. Read more...
title: Microsoft blocks the most popular Windows 11 bypass for internet, MSA, making users angry

description: Bad news for console gamers: Xbox consoles and accessories are officially going up in price. Significantly. Read more...
title: Microsoft increases the price of Xbox consoles and accessories

description: Android 15 has finally passed 10% of market share on Android phones and tablets. The growth in market share coincides with the start of Samsung's OneUI 7 rollout. Read more...
title: Android 15 passes 10% market share, likely due to the OneUI 7 rollout

description: Competing with Chrome is very hard, and even Microsoft is struggling to make a dent in Chrome's market share. Read more...
title: Microsoft Edge is not going anywhere with its market share

description: A new update of ArduinOS is now out. Version 1.3 is based on Ubuntu 25.04 but has been heavily themed to look like Windows 11 out of the box. Read more...
title: ArduinOS 1.3 is a Linux distro that looks like Windows 11, now with GNOME 48 and HDR support

description: Tired of erratic AI behavior in Forza Motorsport? The upcoming update should make things a lot better. Read more...
title: Forza Motorsport is getting much-improved AI drivers

description: Another free game has arrived out of the Epic Games Store, and this time it's a copy of the arcade shooter Super Space Club. Read more...
title: Arcade shooter Super Space Club is free to claim on the Epic Games Store

description: A recent report claimed that the Tesla board was seeking to replace its CEO. Now, Tesla's chair and Elon Musk have called this report false. Read more...
title: Elon Musk accuses WSJ of lying about Tesla looking for a new CEO

description: Microsoft is set to give Europe a multifaceted boost. It's planning to expand its data center operations, boost data privacy, improve cybersecurity in the region, and boost Europe's competitiveness. Read more...
title: Microsoft to give Europe multifaceted boost against backdrop of Trump tariffs

description: Windows 11 is on a steady track to become the most popular Windows release worldwide, and it is now very close to overtaking the outgoing Windows 10. Read more...
title: Windows 11 becomes more popular as it narrows gap with Windows 10

description: Do you use the Gemini chatbot? Google says it is now possible to edit images just by using text prompts. Read more...
title: The Gemini app now lets you edit images directly

description: After delaying the launch by a month, Samsung finally has a set date for the launch of the Galaxy S25 Edge, per a new report. Read more...
title: Mark your calendars, as the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge will debut on May 13, says report

description: Winhance, an unofficial, third-party app for Windows 11/10 tweaking and customisation, has received its latest update, and it's a major one. Read more...
title: This unofficial PowerShell GUI Windows 11/10 customization and tweaking app gets big upgrade

description: Microsoft has published a new Validation OS update. For those not familiar, it is the official lightweight version of Windows 11. Read more...
title: Microsoft updates official lightweight Windows 11 Validation OS with DISM, WPF .NET upgrades

description: Amazon has launched Nova Premier, its most advanced foundation model within the Nova series, available on Amazon Bedrock. Read more...
title: Amazon unveils Nova Premier, its most advanced yet underwhelming model

description: Microsoft has released Phi-4-reasoning and Phi-4-reasoning-plus, 14B-parameter small language models fine-tuned for complex reasoning tasks. Read more...
title: Microsoft: Our Phi-4-reasoning takes on larger models, matches DeepSeek-R1 performance

description: A judge ruled that Apple willfully violated a 2021 injunction preventing it from blocking external payment links in apps. Read more...
title: US Judge rules Apple willfully violated and ignored court's 2021 decision

description: Pinterest users have been voicing concerns over the growing presence of AI-generated content, and the company is now rolling out tools to tackle the issue. Read more...
title: Pinterest launches update to help you fight back against "AI slop" on its platform

description: Visa is partnering with key AI companies through Visa Intelligent Commerce, allowing AI agents to securely pay for items on your behalf. Read more...
title: Visa wants to give AI agents your credit card so that they can shop and pay for you
